name: Lateral Movement - Software Deployment Tools (T1072)
description: Detects potential misuse of legitimate software deployment tools for lateral movement or remote payload delivery. Adversaries may leverage tools like PsExec, SCCM, PDQ Deploy, or WinRM to execute commands on remote hosts.
author: Wahid Hendrawan
query: process.name:(psexec.exe OR psexecsvc.exe OR msiexec.exe OR wmic.exe OR sc.exe OR salt-call OR ansible-playbook OR pdqdeploy.exe OR pdqinventory.exe OR sconfig.cmd OR winrm.cmd OR powershell.exe) AND process.args:(*/install* OR *Invoke-Command* OR *New-PSSession* OR *Enter-PSSession* OR */quiet* OR *\\*)
